content: द्रव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [द्रु गतौ-भावे अप्] {@--1@} Running (as a horse). {@--2@} Dropping, oozing, wet, dripping; आक्षिप्य का चिद् द्रवरागमेव (पादं) <ls>R. 7. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Flowing, fluid. {@--4@} Liquid (<ab>opp.</ab> कठिन); <ls>Ku. 2. 11.</ls> {@--5@} Melted, liquefied. --वः {@--1@} Going, walking about, motion. {@--2@} Dropping, trickling, oozing, exudation. {@--3@} Flight, retreat. {@--4@} Play, amusement, sport. {@--5@} Fluidity, liquefaction. {@--6@} A liquid substance, fluid; <ls>U. 3. 25</ls>; <ls n="U.">2. 16.</ls> {@--7@} Juice, essence. {@--8@} Decoction {@--9@} Speed, velocity. (द्रवीकृ means ‘to melt, liquefy’. द्रवीभू to be melted, as with pity &c.; द्रवीभवति मे मनः <ls>Mv. 7. 34</ls>; द्रवीभूतं प्रेम्णा तव हृदयमस्मिन्क्षण इव <ls>U. 3. 13</ls>; द्रवीभूतं मन्ये पतति जलरूपणे गगनं <ls>Mk. 5. 25.</ls>)
